vMix securely stores your data on Google Cloud infrastructure.

We collect data and process data when you:
When you visit our websites, we may collect information from you automatically through cookies or similar technology.

Our Company uses cookies in a range of ways to improve your experience on our website, including:
Our Company uses these cookies so that we recognize you on our website and remember your previously selected preferences.
There are a number of different types of cookies, however, our website uses:

vMix collects the following data: Name and Email address (for vMix software registration)
vMix will keep IP Address, Name and Email address data for as long as you are a customer with us.

vMix collects the following data: IP address and Name of computer running the vMix software
vMix will keep IP Address, Name and Email address data for as long as you are a customer with us.
